TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UnmanagedMemoryStream extends System.IO.Stream

Docs.summary: Provides access to unmanaged blocks of memory from managed code.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個類別支援使用現有的資料流為基礎的模型的 unmanaged 記憶體存取，而且不需要的 unmanaged 記憶體中的內容複製到堆積。
[!INCLUDE[note_unnecessary_dispose](~/includes/note-unnecessary-dispose.md)]
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取和寫入 unmanaged 的記憶體使用<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream>類別。 配置和解除配置使用的 unmanaged 記憶體區塊<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal>類別。
[!code-csharp[System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream/cs/sample.cs#1)]

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected UnmanagedMemoryStream ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: UnmanagedMemoryStream();

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Docs.exception: The user does not have the required permission.
Docs.permission: 用於存取 unmanaged 的記憶體。

MemberSignature.Value: public UnmanagedMemoryStream (byte* pointer, long length);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(unsigned int8* pointer, int64 length) cil managed

Docs.param: A pointer to an unmanaged memory location.
The length of the memory to use.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified location and memory length.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個建構函式建立的新執行個體<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream>類別，並依預設會設定<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream.CanWrite%2A>屬性`false`和<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream.CanRead%2A>屬性`true`。 <xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream.Length%2A>屬性設定的值為`length`參數，而且無法變更。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取和寫入 unmanaged 的記憶體使用<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream>類別。 配置和解除配置使用的 unmanaged 記憶體區塊<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal>類別。
[!code-csharp[System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream_Example#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream_Example/cs/program.cs#00)]

The value is less than zero. \- or - The is large enough to cause an overflow.

需要完全信任立即呼叫者。 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

MemberSignature.Value: public UnmanagedMemoryStream (byte* pointer, long length, long capacity, System.IO.FileAccess access);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(unsigned int8* pointer, int64 length, int64 capacity, valuetype System.IO.FileAccess access) cil managed
public: UnmanagedMemoryStream(System::Byte* pointer, long length, long capacity, System::IO::FileAccess access);

Docs.param: A pointer to an unmanaged memory location.
The length of the memory to use.
The total amount of memory assigned to the stream.
One of the values.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified location, memory length, total amount of memory, and file access values.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `length`參數定義中使用目前的記憶體數量。 如果讀取或寫入資料流，附加資料`length`值應該等於要讀取的資料流中的有效資料量，或保留。 如果寫入資料流，此值應該是零。
`capacity`參數表示的可用總記憶體量。 這個值可以描述超過指定長度的區域，或表示您可以附加至的區域。 任何嘗試寫入超過此值將會失敗。
`access`參數集<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream.CanRead%2A>，和<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream.CanWrite%2A>屬性。 請注意該指定<xref:System.IO.FileAccess.Write>不保證的資料流將是可寫入。 存取參數可讓實作器建立其實作可比對實際資料流所公開的物件。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取和寫入 unmanaged 的記憶體使用<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream>類別。 配置和解除配置使用的 unmanaged 記憶體區塊<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal>類別。
[!code-csharp[System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream/cs/sample.cs#1)]

## Remarks 這個屬性會指出目前資料流物件是否支援讀取。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取和寫入 unmanaged 的記憶體使用<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream>類別。 配置和解除配置使用的 unmanaged 記憶體區塊<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal>類別。 在此範例中，<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream>物件傳遞至方法，這個方法會檢查<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream.CanRead%2A>屬性，才能嘗試對主控台顯示內容。
[!code-csharp[System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream_Example#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream_Example/cs/program.cs#00)]

## Remarks 這個屬性會指出目前資料流物件是否支援寫入。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取和寫入 unmanaged 的記憶體使用<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream>類別。 配置和解除配置使用的 unmanaged 記憶體區塊<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal>類別。 在此範例中，<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream>物件傳遞至方法，這個方法會檢查<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream.CanWrite%2A>屬性，然後再嘗試將資料寫入資料流。
[!code-csharp[System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream_Example#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream_Example/cs/program.cs#00)]

.property instance int64 Capacity
Public ReadOnly Property Capacity As Long
public: property long Capacity { long get(); };
member this.Capacity : int64

Docs.summary: Gets the stream length (size) or the total amount of memory assigned to a stream (capacity).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回`capacity`值提供給建構函式。 如果沒有`capacity`初始化資料流時指定了值，這個屬性會傳回資料流的長度。

Docs.exception: The stream is closed.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);
override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

Docs.param: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> 叫用受保護<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream.Dispose%2A>方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream.Dispose%2A>與`disposing`設`false`。
`disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 <xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream> 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> 方法。

block.para: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。在覆寫小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需有關和，請參閱 [總未受管理的 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 清除。

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Flush ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Flush() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Flush ()
public: override void Flush();
override this.Flush : unit -> unit

Docs.summary: Overrides the method so that no action is performed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會執行任何動作，但這個類別是包含在<xref:System.IO.Stream>基底類別。 由於 RAM 寫入任何資料，這個方法是多餘的。

Docs.exception: The stream is closed.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Threading.Tasks.Task FlushAsync (System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task FlushAsync(valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
public: override System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ FlushAsync(System::Threading::CancellationToken cancellationToken);
override this.FlushAsync : System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task

Docs.param: The token to monitor for cancellation requests. The default value is .
Docs.summary: Overrides the method so that the operation is cancelled if specified, but no other action is performed. Available starting in .NET Framework 4.6
Docs.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous flush operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未取消作業，<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream>呼叫<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream.Flush%2A>方法，這表示不執行任何動作。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法相當於<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。 它支援需要初始化之前設定資料流變數的指標，因此，無法呼叫參數化建構函式的方法。 這類方法應該使用預設建構函式<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream.%23ctor>、 初始化指標，並接著叫用<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream.Initialize%2A>方法。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果沒有變更，因為資料流已經初始化，則這個屬性會傳回提供給建構函式的長度值。 如果已經發生變更之資料流，此屬性會反映資料的長度的任何變更。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取和寫入 unmanaged 的記憶體使用<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream>類別。 配置和解除配置使用的 unmanaged 記憶體區塊<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal>類別。
[!code-csharp[System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream_Example#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream_Example/cs/program.cs#00)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override long Position { get; set; }
.property instance int64 Position
Public Overrides Property Position As Long
public: virtual property long Position { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.Position : int64 with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the current position in a stream.
Docs.value: 在資料流中的目前位置。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 當初始化資料流時，這個屬性設為零。
雖然您可以設定資料流的容量超出資料流的位置，您將無法存取該區域使用<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream.Read%2A>和<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream.Write%2A>方法。 <xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream.Read%2A> 會傳回 0 和<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream.Write%2A>將會擲回<xref:System.NotSupportedException>。 這項支援主要是基本的資料流作業與設計和程式碼相容性。

Docs.exception: The stream is closed.
The position is set to a value that is less than zero, or the position is larger than or results in overflow when added to the current pointer.

MemberSignature.Value: public byte* PositionPointer { get; set; }
.property instance unsigned int8* PositionPointer
public: property System::Byte* PositionPointer { System::Byte* get(); void set(System::Byte* value); };
member this.PositionPointer : nativeptr<byte> with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a byte pointer to a stream based on the current position in the stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要傳回整個資料流的指標，將<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream.Position%2A>屬性設為零，並接著呼叫這個屬性。

Docs.exception: The current position is larger than the capacity of the stream.
The position is being set is not a valid position in the current stream.
The pointer is being set to a lower value than the starting position of the stream.
The stream was initialized for use with a . The property is valid only for streams that are initialized with a pointer.
Docs.permission: 呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼，例如先呼叫原生程式碼與平台叫用或 COM 整合。 安全性動作： 。 相關聯的列舉型別：
需要完全信任立即呼叫者。 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

MemberSignature.Value: public override int Read (Span<byte> destination);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 Read(valuetype System.Span`1<unsigned int8> destination) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read (destination As Span(Of Byte)) As Integer
public: override int Read(Span<System::Byte> destination);
override this.Read : Span<byte> -> int

Docs.param: To be added.
Docs.summary: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int Read (byte[] buffer, int offset, int count);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 Read([out] unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 offset, int32 count) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read (buffer As Byte(), offset As Integer, count As Integer) As Integer
public: override int Read(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int offset, int count);
override this.Read : byte[] * int * int -> int

Docs.param: When this method returns, contains the specified byte array with the values between offset and (offset + count - 1) replaced by the bytes read from the current source. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.
The maximum number of bytes to read from the current stream.
Docs.summary: Reads the specified number of bytes into the specified array.
Docs.returns: The total number of bytes read into the buffer. This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the stream has been reached.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `offset`參數會提供中的位元組位移`array`參數 （緩衝區索引） 中要開始閱讀，而`count`參數指定要從這個資料流讀取的位元組數目上限。 如果已到達資料流結尾，傳回的值會是個位元組，則為零的實際數目。 如果在讀取的作業成功，讀取的位元組數目進階資料流的目前位置。 如果發生例外狀況，目前資料流的位置不變。
<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream.Read%2A>方法會傳回零只到達資料流結尾之後。 否則，<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream.Read%2A>一律會讀取至少一個位元組資料流後再傳回。 如果沒有資料可從呼叫時，資料流<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream.Read%2A>，方法會封鎖直到至少一個位元組的資料可能會傳回。 實作可以自由地傳回比要求的位元組更少，即使尚未達到資料流結尾。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取和寫入 unmanaged 的記憶體使用<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream>類別。 配置和解除配置使用的 unmanaged 記憶體區塊<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal>類別。
[!code-csharp[System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream/cs/sample.cs#1)]

Docs.exception: The stream is closed.
The underlying memory does not support reading. \- or - The property is set to .
The parameter is set to .
The parameter is less than zero. \- or - The parameter is less than zero.
The length of the buffer array minus the parameter is less than the parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Threading.Tasks.Task<int> ReadAsync (byte[] buffer, int offset, int count, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<int32> ReadAsync(unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 offset, int32 count, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
public: override System::Threading::Tasks::Task<int> ^ ReadAsync(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int offset, int count, System::Threading::CancellationToken cancellationToken);
override this.ReadAsync : byte[] * int * int * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<int>

Docs.param: The buffer to write the data into.
The byte offset in buffer at which to begin writing data from the stream.
The maximum number of bytes to read.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests. The default value is .
Docs.summary: Asynchronously reads the specified number of bytes into the specified array. Available starting in .NET Framework 4.6
Docs.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation. The value of the parameter contains the total number of bytes read into the buffer. The result value can be less than the number of bytes requested if the number of bytes currently available is less than the requested number, or it can be 0 (zero) if the end of the stream has been reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在讀取作業期間發生例外狀況，它會設定為<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Exception%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>所傳回工作的屬性。

MemberSignature.Value: public override int ReadByte ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 ReadByte() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ReadByte () As Integer
public: override int ReadByte();
override this.ReadByte : unit -> int

Docs.summary: Reads a byte from a stream and advances the position within the stream by one byte, or returns -1 if at the end of the stream.
Docs.returns: The unsigned byte cast to an object, or -1 if at the end of the stream.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用此方法傳回的整數值，從資料流。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取和寫入 unmanaged 的記憶體使用<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream>類別。 配置和解除配置使用的 unmanaged 記憶體區塊<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal>類別。 在此範例中，<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream>物件傳遞至方法，這個方法會檢查<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream.CanRead%2A>屬性之後再嘗試讀取，並對主控台顯示內容。
[!code-csharp[System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream_Example#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream_Example/cs/program.cs#00)]

Docs.exception: The stream is closed.
The underlying memory does not support reading. \- or - The current position is at the end of the stream.

MemberSignature.Value: public override long Seek (long offset, System.IO.SeekOrigin loc);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int64 Seek(int64 offset, valuetype System.IO.SeekOrigin loc) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Seek (offset As Long, loc As SeekOrigin) As Long
public: override long Seek(long offset, System::IO::SeekOrigin loc);
override this.Seek : int64 * System.IO.SeekOrigin -> int64

Docs.param: The point relative to origin to begin seeking from.
Specifies the beginning, the end, or the current position as a reference point for origin, using a value of type .
Docs.summary: Sets the current position of the current stream to the given value.
Docs.returns: The new position in the stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需搜尋的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Seek%2A>。

Docs.exception: An attempt was made to seek before the beginning of the stream.
The value is larger than the maximum size of the stream.
is invalid.
The stream is closed.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void SetLength (long value);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void SetLength(int64 value) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub SetLength (value As Long)
public: override void SetLength(long value);
override this.SetLength : int64 -> unit

Docs.param: The length of the stream.
Docs.summary: Sets the length of a stream to a specified value.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果指定的值小於目前資料流的長度，則會截斷資料流。 如果指定的值大於目前資料流的長度，則會展開資料流。 如果展開資料流時，舊之間的新長度的資料流的內容會是未定義。
資料流必須支援寫入和搜尋的<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream.SetLength%2A>運作。

Docs.exception: An I/O error has occurred.
The stream is closed.
The underlying memory does not support writing. \- or - An attempt is made to write to the stream and the property is .
The specified exceeds the capacity of the stream. \- or - The specified is negative.

override this.Write : ReadOnlySpan<byte> -> unit

Docs.param: To be added.
Docs.summary: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Write (byte[] buffer, int offset, int count);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Write(unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 offset, int32 count) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Write (buffer As Byte(), offset As Integer, count As Integer)
public: override void Write(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int offset, int count);
override this.Write : byte[] * int * int -> unit

Docs.param: The byte array from which to copy bytes to the current stream.
The offset in the buffer at which to begin copying bytes to the current stream.
The number of bytes to write to the current stream.
Docs.summary: Writes a block of bytes to the current stream using data from a buffer.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 資料流中目前的位置進行寫入。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取和寫入 unmanaged 的記憶體使用<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream>類別。 配置和解除配置使用的 unmanaged 記憶體區塊<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal>類別。
[!code-csharp[System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream/cs/sample.cs#1)]

Docs.exception: The stream is closed.

The underlying memory does not support writing. \- or - An attempt is made to write to the stream and the property is . \- or - The value is greater than the capacity of the stream. \- or - The position is at the end of the stream capacity.
An I/O error occurs.
One of the specified parameters is less than zero.
The parameter minus the length of the parameter is less than the parameter.
The parameter is .

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Threading.Tasks.Task WriteAsync (byte[] buffer, int offset, int count, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task WriteAsync(unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 offset, int32 count, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
public: override System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ WriteAsync(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int offset, int count, System::Threading::CancellationToken cancellationToken);
override this.WriteAsync : byte[] * int * int * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task

Docs.param: The buffer to write data from.
The zero-based byte offset in buffer from which to begin copying bytes to the stream.
The maximum number of bytes to write.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests. The default value is .
Docs.summary: Asynchronously writes a sequence of bytes to the current stream, advances the current position within this stream by the number of bytes written, and monitors cancellation requests. Available starting in .NET Framework 4.6
Docs.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在寫入作業期間發生例外狀況，它會設定為<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Exception%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>所傳回工作的屬性。

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteByte(unsigned int8 value) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub WriteByte (value As Byte)
public: override void WriteByte(System::Byte value);
override this.WriteByte : byte -> unit

Docs.param: A byte value written to the stream.
Docs.summary: Writes a byte to the current position in the file stream.

remarks.format:
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取和寫入 unmanaged 的記憶體使用<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream>類別。 配置和解除配置使用的 unmanaged 記憶體區塊<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal>類別。 在此範例中，<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream>物件傳遞至方法，這個方法會檢查<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream.CanWrite%2A>屬性，然後再嘗試將資料寫入資料流。
[!code-csharp[System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream_Example#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream_Example/cs/program.cs#00)]

Docs.exception: The stream is closed.
The underlying memory does not support writing. \- or - An attempt is made to write to the stream and the property is . \- or - The current position is at the end of the capacity of the stream.
The supplied causes the stream exceed its maximum capacity.
